trends: There have been no other sightings in mackinaw

divs: sighting detailsi was not there i was looking at my moms videos of the mackinaw bridge an saw something go by the screen i thought it was a bird at first until i put it on the computer an looked at it by zooming an to out it was a circle shape object that was silver an left kinda like a heat wave behind but disspeared emmedieatly it was weird but that was the only thing i saw it was so close to the car i cant believe they did not see it like i said i was not there i dont no for sure if it was a ufo or a bird but ya i have a video of it i will attach it to this event but i wish not to be called or interview cuz my parents already think im crazy im always watching the skyies now for something else to appear :d thank you but you may contact me through email if you wish. (link removed and placed in investigation field) 08\13\11 19:57cst flg <-- there is a link to my youtube account of where i put the video i have the actual video on my camera if you would like to see that to. let me no thanks.
